title: Aztaka 1.53
description:
This is: Aztaka 1.53

An action/rpg side-scroller. Kinda seems to have gone under everyone's radar (was initially released in 2009, but recently updated)... it's a pretty awesome game. I don't dig side-scrollers, but this one's RPG elements and top-notch visuals make it worth a try.
--------------------------------------

As Huitzilo, heir of the Sun God, skilled in both the arts of combat and magic, only you can save your people from the wrath of the Aztec Gods by reuniting the seven phonograms.
